channel.title: Omfg another bug make this sticky if its not!
channel.description:
[b]YOU ALL DONT I REAPAT DONT!!! ACCEPT ANYLINKS IN YOUR PMS!! IVE JUST GOT ANOTHER ONE TODAY THIS IS WHAT IT SAYS SO BE AWARE!!![/b]
ITS BUY VALLDE11
Yesterday, Jagex updated varrock and the museum. Inside the museum there is a new minigame where it is possible to obtain lamps that raise your XP by 1K or 10K.
We at KwickFix released a program to spawn these lamps, which to our best knowledge worked in MOST cases due to a glitch that Jagex will most likely fix in a few updates time. However, we have now finalised the 100% working program and are releasing it to the public with a short guide. This will most likely not work for long as Jagex are quick to fix bugs.
Firstly, you need to be standing AROUND the gate in the museum, as shown here: [img]http://i16.tinypic.com/6b3tp28.png[/img]
Then, simply scroll to select how many lamps you wish to make, and VOILA! They will appear under your feet. Then you can simply use them to raise the skill of your choice!
[img]http://i16.tinypic.com/5xy2g6s.png[/img]
[img]http://i7.tinypic.com/626j3lw.png[/img]
If the program doesn't work, run a test to check the connection. If it fails then make sure it is cleared for access by your firewall.
[img]http://i8.tinypic.com/6b2myxu.png[/img]
-------------
THEN THE DOWNLOAD LINK IS HERE!!! [b]
DONT DOWNLOAD THIS FILE!!!!!! U WILL EITHIER GET A VIRUS OR KEYLOGGER OR TROJAN!![/b]
